original: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: akusalam dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: akusalam bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanevadassanena
analyzed: akusalam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na neva dassanena

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nanevadassanena
analyzed: abyākatam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paccayā na abyākataḥ na na iva dassanena

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
